item.title: Music player display - Time tracker
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: â€Ž To ease your read, please start from the project containing all the different steps applied so far in this tutorial. To do so, refer to the project setup guide and resume from the sample located in the folder “3 - Page Scaffolding”. In the previous article, we set up a matrix to display all the controls of our music player. So we can now add concrete elements for the user!
